text: Andrew Hughes may refer to: *Andrew Hughes (actor) (1908-1996), Turkish born actor *Andrew Hughes (police officer) (1956–2018), Fijian Commissioner of Police *Andrew Hughes (footballer, born 1978), English footballer *Andrew Hughes (footballer, born 1992), Welsh footballer *Andrew Hughes (musicologist), see List of University of Toronto people *Andrew Hughes (politician) (1902–1996), Australian politician *Andrew Hughes (rugby union) (born 1995), English rugby union player *Andy Hughes (1965–2009), music producer == See also == * Hughes (surname)
title: Andrew Hughes
